sentences.en: A poet could not but be gay in such a jocund company.
sentences.cn: 一个诗人在这种兴高采烈的同伴中自然而然地会快乐。

sentences.en: All that is jocund and sparkling , the brooks running.
sentences.cn: 那容光焕发的一切, 奔流的小河.

sentences.en: Her jocund character made her the most popular girl in the county.
sentences.cn: 她快乐的个性使她成为这个郡最受欢迎的女孩.

sentences.en: However, today the fog is unusually thin, through which the soft golden sunbeams filter and cloak everything on the ground with a jocund hue.
sentences.cn: 今天，难得雾是这么稀薄，空中融融地混合着金黄的阳光，把地上的一切，好像也照上一层欢笑的颜色。

sentences.en: I could not but be gay in such a jocund company.
sentences.cn: 我和如此快乐的同伴在一起岂能不乐.

sentences.en: Jocund day stands tiptoe on the misty mountain tops.
sentences.cn: 愉悦的一天又踮脚站在云雾弥漫的山顶.

sentences.en: Poet could not But be gay In such a jocund company!
sentences.cn: 与这样快活的伴侣为伍,诗人怎能不满心欢乐!

sentences.en: Their hearts were jocund and sublime.
